Author: kindbear_kindbud
Text: I love kratom. It suppresses my appetite in the sense that I have fewer intrusive/obsessive thoughts about food, because my mind stays focused on other things. Also overeating/binging is a stress coping mechanism for me, and kratom makes me feel relaxed so I'm less likely to stress eat.
